Paragraph: Recently , vasopressor responses that are distinct from the cranial circulation have been demonstrated to occur in the systemic , pulmonary , and coronary circulations .

In the given paragraph, the term "vasopressor" is the only chemical entity. Vasopressors are medications that constrict blood vessels and increase blood pressure.
